Description: Lamp. Made of green glazed pottery (beige).
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Fustat, MLA register: "From the official excavations at Fostat; selected by Mr Somers Clarke, F.S.A."
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 352-3 (Group Three/Four).
